column2: one goes to the Art Institute to see the famous Impressionism collection. And this exhibit more than lived up to the expectations. In the impressionism collection
column3: one could find an extensive collection of the Monets
column4: Cezannes and in the like. Although the ever popular exhibit is full of people
column5: the environment is tranquil and the French impressionist works through the elegant brushstrokes give deep and profound meaning to the human experience.
